Class ControlPoint

    • com.orbischallenge.game.SidedModel<com.orbischallenge.ctz.objects.cores.ControlPointCore>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.orbischallenge.ctz.objects.interfaces.IControlPoint

    public class ControlPoint
extends com.orbischallenge.game.SidedModel<com.orbischallenge.ctz.objects.cores.ControlPointCore>
implements com.orbischallenge.ctz.objects.interfaces.IControlPoint
    Represents a Control Point that can be captured by a team. Created by Orbis Access (Canada) Ltd on 17/06/2016.
